The developers have provided links to VirusTotal, a website that scans files for viruses and malware, for each platform (MacOS, Linux-x86-64, Linux-ARM64, and Windows). By checking the detection results on VirusTotal, you can get an idea of whether the software is likely to be safe to install on your system. However, keep in mind that no software is completely risk-free, and it is always a good idea to exercise caution when installing new software.
